acceptance.name: ACCEPTANCE
acceptance.description: The people around me approve of what I do and who I am

curiosity.name: CURIOSITY
curiosity.description: I have plenty of things to investigate and to think about

honor.name: HONOR
honor.description: I feel proud that my personal values are reflected in how I work

mastery.name: MASTERY
mastery.description: My work challenges my competence but it is still within my abilities

power.name: POWER
power.description: There's enough room for me to influence what happens around me

freedom.name: FREEDOM
freedom.description: I am independent of others with my work and my responsibilities

relatedness.name: RELATEDNESS
relatedness.description: I have good social contacts with the people in my work

order.name: ORDER
order.description: There are enough rules and policies for a stable environment

goal.name: GOAL
goal.description: My purpose in life is reflected in the work that I do

status.name: STATUS
status.description: My position is good, and recognized by the people who work with me
